product.description: Every key component of the Dolce was specifically selected for riders like you, looking to tackle everything from the weekend workout to the upcoming century ride. The Dolce Elite has an A1 alloy frame with Women's Endurance Geometry and Zertz for a responsive, yet forgiving ride, while the Shimano Tiagra drivetrain provides wide gear options with smooth shifting. To help get you ready for your first adventure, the EQ comes equipped with two alloy Zee cages and a Mini-Wedgie seat bag.

bullets.bullet: A1 Premium Aluminium frame with Women's Endurance Geometry, hydroformed alloy seatstays, and Zertz provides a quick and responsive, yet forgiving ride
Lightweight FACT carbon fork for precision steering through tight turns, with Zertz inserts to absorb road chatter
Lightweight and durable, FSA Tempo 10-speed compact crankset with Shimano Tiagra drivetrain provides reliable shifting and performance
Body Geometry Riva Women's saddle features generous padding for all-day performance and comfort
Two colour-matched, alloy Zee cages and a matching Mini-Wedgie seat bag for a bike that is ready for any ride, right out of the box

skus.sku: 90814-4244 DOLCE ELITE C2 EQ MET BLK/WHT/FLORED 44

specs.frame: FRAME Specialized A1 Premium Aluminium w/ Zertz inserts, Women's Endurance Geometry and fully manipulated tubesets w/ smooth welds, 1-1/8" lower bearing
specs.fork: FORK Specialized Dolce, FACT carbon w/ Zertz inserts, alloy steerer/crown for 1-1/8" bearings
specs.headset: HEADSET 1-1/8" sealed Cr-Mo cartridge bearings integrated w/ headset, 20mm alloy cone spacer
specs.stem: STEM Specialized Elite-Set, 3D forged alloy, 4-position adjustable, 4-bolt, 31.8mm clamp
specs.handlebars: HANDLEBARS Specialized Comp, 6061 alloy, shallow bend
specs.tape: TAPE Specialized Roubaix, w/ 2.5mm gel pads, bar shapers
specs.front_brake: FRONT BRAKE Tektro, dual pivot, cartridge pad
specs.rear_brake: REAR BRAKE Tektro, dual pivot, cartridge pad
specs.bottom_bracket: BOTTOM BRACKET Sealed cartridge bearings, square taper, 68mm
specs.pedals: PEDALS Nylon flat test ride, loose ball, w/ reflectors
specs.front_tire: FRONT TYRE Specialized Espoir Sport, 60TPI, wire bead, double BlackBelt protection, 700x25c
specs.rear_tire: REAR TYRE Specialized Espoir Sport, 60TPI, wire bead, double BlackBelt protection, 700x25c
specs.saddle: SADDLE Body Geometry Riva Sport Women's, steel rails, 155mm

product.description: Every key component of the Dolce was specifically selected for riders like you, looking to tackle everything from the weekend workout to the upcoming century ride. The Dolce Sport has an A1 alloy frame with Women's Endurance Geometry and Zertz for a responsive, yet forgiving ride, while the Shimano Sora compact drivetrain provides reliable and quiet shifting. To help get you ready for your first adventure, the EQ comes equipped with two alloy Zee cages and a Mini-Wedgie seat bag.

bullets.bullet: A1 Premium Aluminium frame with Women's Endurance Geometry, hydroformed alloy seatstays, and Zertz provides a quick and responsive, yet forgiving ride
Lightweight FACT carbon fork for precision steering through tight turns, with Zertz inserts to absorb road chatter
Tough, durable, three-cross AXIS Classic wheelset with J-bend spokes; Espoir Sport road tyres with double BlackBelt puncture protection for a reliable ride
FSA Tempo 9-speed compact crankset plus Shimano Sora drivetrain for durability with reliable and quiet shifting
Body Geometry Riva Women's saddle features generous padding for all-day performance and comfort
Two colour-matched, alloy Zee cages and a matching Mini-Wedgie seat bag for a bike that is ready for any ride, right out of the box

product.description: Every key component of the Dolce was specifically selected for riders like you, looking to tackle everything from the weekend workout to the upcoming century ride. The Dolce has an A1 alloy frame with Women's Endurance Geometry plus Zertz for a responsive, yet forgiving ride, while the Shimano compact drivetrain provides reliable and quiet shifting. To help get you ready for your first adventure, the EQ comes equipped with two alloy Zee cages and a Mini-Wedgie seat bag.

bullets.bullet: Smooth-welded A1 Premium Aluminium frame with Women's Endurance Geometry delivers great performance and value
Lightweight FACT carbon fork for precision steering through tight turns, with Zertz inserts to absorb road chatter
Tough, durable, three-cross AXIS Classic wheelset with J-bend spokes
Reliable, high-quality Shimano 2400 Claris drivetrain and compact crankset for trouble-free shifting, plus Shimano 2400 Claris STI shifters
Body Geometry Riva Women's saddle features generous padding for all-day performance and comfort
Two colour-matched alloy Zee cages and a matching Mini-Wedgie seat bag for a bike that is ready for any ride, right out of the box

specs.frame: FRAME Specialized A1 Premium Aluminium, fully manipulated tubesets, 1-1/8" lower bearing

specs.handlebars: HANDLEBARS Specialized Comp, 6061 alloy, shallow bend
